title: Gastro-intestinal cancer: problem of early diagnosis
brief_description: A survey of cancer reviewing salient points in diagnosis and stressing importance of early discovery and treatment in lowering mortality figures. The film was produced for use by general practitioners, residents, particularly of internal medicine, interns and medical students in their clinical years.
